com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Class SpenObjectTextBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectShapeBase
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectShape
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectTextBox

  • public final class SpenObjectTextBox
extends SpenObjectShape
    This class represents a text box and provides methods for managing text boxes.

    Some APIs and variables are moved or integrated to super class SpenObjectShape since 4.0.0.
    And internal classes for text span and paragraph are separated to com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.textspan package since 4.0.0.
    Since:
    3.0.0

      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.getCursorPosition().
      RectF getDrawnRect()
      Get the region that the rectangle takes up in the viewport.
      String getFont()
      Get the font name for normal format text.
      The default font is null.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to get the font attributes.
      This method gets the font name where the cursor is positioned.
      float getFontSize()
      Get the font size for normal format text.
      The default size is 10.
      int getLineBorderColor()
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenLineColorEffect.

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.getTextSpan().
      int getTextAlignment()
      Get the text alignment for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.
      This method gets the text alignment where the cursor is positioned.
      int getTextColor()
      Get the font color of the normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to set the font attributes.
      This method gets the text color where the cursor is positioned.
      int getTextDirection()
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, not supported anymore.
      float getTextLineSpacing()
      Get the line spacing value for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.
      This method gets the text line spacing value where the cursor is positioned.
      int getTextLineSpacingType()
      Get the line spacing type for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.
      This method gets the text line spacing type where the cursor is positioned.
      int getTextStyle()
      Get the text style for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.
      This method gets the text style where the cursor is positioned.

      Check if the object is changed.
      The changed flag is set when object data is changed using the API.
      If this object is saved by SpenPageDoc, clear the flag.

      Set the background color to fill the SpenObjectTextBox area.
      void setBorderType(int type)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenLineStyleEffect.
      void setBulletType(int type)
      Set the specified bullet style for normal format text.
      The default value is BULLET_TYPE_NONE.
      If you use this method for rich format text, the existing bullets of text are replaced with the new bullet type.
      void setCursorPos(int position)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.setCursorPosition(int).
      void setFont(String font)
      Set the font name for normal format text.
      The default font is null.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to set the font attributes.
      If you use this method for rich format text, the existing fonts of text are replaced with the new font.
      void setFontSize(float size)
      Set the specified font size for normal format text.
      The default size is 10.
      void setLineBorderColor(int color)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenLineColorEffect.
      void setLineBorderWidth(float width)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenLineStyleEffect.

      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.setTextParagraph(ArrayList).

      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.setTextReadOnlyEnabled(boolean).
      void setRect(RectF rect, boolean regionOnly)
      Set the specified rectangle of the region.
      Object forwards the regionOnly parameter to ObjectBase.
      void setSpan(ArrayList<SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo> span)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.setTextSpan(ArrayList).
      void setTextAlignment(int align)
      Set the specified text alignment option for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to set the text attributes.
      If you use this method for rich format text, the existing alignments of text are replaced with the new alignment type.
      void setTextColor(int color)
      Set the specified font color for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to set the font attributes.
      If you use this method for rich format text, the existing text colors are replaced with new text color.
      void setTextDirection(int direction)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, not supported anymore.
      void setTextLineSpacingInfo(int type, float lineSpacing)
      Set the specified line spacing type and value for normal format text.
      If you use this method for rich format text, its line space and paragraph information are deleted.
      If you use this method for rich format text, the line spacing information of text are replaced with the new line spacing information.
      void setTextStyle(int style)
      Set the specified font style for normal format text.
      For rich format text, use the span classes to set the text attributes.
      void setVereticalPan(float position)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.0.0, replaced by SpenObjectShape.setVerticalPan(float).

        public void setFontSize(float size)

      • setTextLineSpacingInfo

        public void setTextLineSpacingInfo(int type,
                                   float lineSpacing)
        Set the specified line spacing type and value for normal format text.
        If you use this method for rich format text, its line space and paragraph information are deleted.
        If you use this method for rich format text, the line spacing information of text are replaced with the new line spacing information.
        Parameters:
        type - The text lineSpacing type. One of LINE_SPACING_PIXEL or LINE_SPACING_PERCENT.
        lineSpacing - The text lineSpacing
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the type is not 0 or 1.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the lineSpacing is negative, if type is LINE_SPACING_PIXEL.
        If the lineSpacing is negative or zero, if type is LINE_SPACING_PERCENT.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        getTextLineSpacingType()

      • getTextLineSpacingType

        public int getTextLineSpacingType()
        Get the line spacing type for normal format text.
        For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.
        This method gets the text line spacing type where the cursor is positioned.
        Returns:
        The text line spacing. The value returned depends on the set line spacing type set.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setTextLineSpacingInfo(int type, float lineSpacing)

      • getTextLineSpacing

        public float getTextLineSpacing()
        Get the line spacing value for normal format text.
        For rich format text, use the span classes to get the text attributes.

        Returns:
        The text line spacing.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:

      • getDrawnRect

        public RectF getDrawnRect()
        Description copied from class: SpenObjectBase
        Get the region that the rectangle takes up in the viewport. If an object got rectangle(1, 1, 2, 4) is rotated by 90 degrees using setRotate(90), rectangle is still (1, 1, 2, 4) but DrawnRect is (0, 2, 3, 3).
        Overrides:
        getDrawnRect in class SpenObjectBase
        Returns:
        The viewing object area.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenObjectBase.getRect()
